invalidProfileToast.title: Invalid form
invalidProfileToast.body: Your account cannot be updated because some fields are missing or invalid.

sessionInvalidationToast.title: Prepare to be logged out
sessionInvalidationToast.body: Your info has been saved. For your own security, your session will expire in a few seconds. You will need to type your password again to continue using Duty Duck.

successToast.title: Info updated
successToast.body: Your info has been updated. You can continue using Duty Duck.

myAccount.phoneNumberDescription: Your mobile number will be used to send you SMS notifications in case of incidents. It will never be used for advertising purposes.
myAccount.phoneNumberNotVerified: Your mobile number is not verified. Please verify your mobile number to receive SMS notifications.
myAccount.phoneNumberVerified: Your mobile number is verified. You will receive SMS notifications if they are enabled.
myAccount.noPhoneNumberConfigured: You have not configured a mobile number. Edit your information to configure your mobile number.

phoneVerificationModal.title: Phone number verification
phoneVerificationModal.initialInstructions: Click the button below to receive a verification code to your mobile number. You will then be prompted to enter the code you received to verify your mobile number.
phoneVerificationModal.codeSentInstructions: A verification code has been sent to your mobile number ({phoneNumber}). Please enter the code below to verify your mobile number.
phoneVerificationModal.codeInputPlaceholder: Enter the verification code you have received
phoneVerificationModal.sendErrorMessage: The code could not be sent. Please try again later.
phoneVerificationModal.confirmErrorMessage: The code you entered was incorrect or the verification process failed. Please try again.
phoneVerificationModal.requestNewCodeInstructions: You can request a new verification code by clicking the button below.

successToastNotification.title: User invited
successToastNotification.body: The user has been invited to the organization

errorToastNotification.title: Error inviting user
errorToastNotification.body: An error occurred while inviting the user

inviteUserModal.title: Invite user to organization
inviteUserModal.description: You can invite users to your organization, {organization}, by entering their email address below.
inviteUserModal.emailDescription: They will receive an email with a link to join the organization.

updateUserRolesModal.title: Update user roles
updateUserRolesModal.description: You are about to update the roles of {firstName} {lastName}.

revokeUserModal.title: Revoke user from organization
revokeUserModal.confirmationMessage: You are about to revoke {firstName} {lastName} from the organization. This action cannot be undone.
revokeUserModal.instructionMessage: To complete the action, please enter the user name below:

apiTokens.title: API Tokens
apiTokens.description: Use API tokens to authenticate your requests to our API. API tokens are linked to your account and have a long lifetime. You must include them as an HTTP header for all your API requests.
apiTokens.noTokens: You don't have any API tokens yet.

form.description: Create a new API token to interact with our API. The expiration date must at most 12 months in the future.
form.label: Token Label

apiTokens.tokenCreated: Your API token has been created successfully
apiTokens.secretKeyWarning: Make sure to copy your secret key now. You won't be able to see it again!
apiTokens.createTokenFailed: Failed to create token. Maybe the expiration date is too far in the future, or in the past. Please try again.
